sentences.en: 13 soldiers were killed and 10 wounded in action.
sentences.cn: 战斗中有13名士兵阵亡，10名士兵受伤。

sentences.en: a heart attack put him out of action.
sentences.cn: 他心脏病发作，无法继续工作。

sentences.en: Action had been taken to speed up the release of cheques.
sentences.cn: 已经采取行动加速支票的发放。

sentences.en: Ambulance crews are ready to spring into action (=  suddenly start doing something  ) if anything goes wrong during the race.
sentences.cn: 救护车急救人员随时准备出动，以应对比赛期间发生的意外。

sentences.en: Any action on the basis of such fragmentary evidence would be foolish.
sentences.cn: 基于如此不完整的证据采取的任何行动都是愚蠢的。

sentences.en: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
sentences.cn: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

sentences.en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentences.en: It was a rare pleasure to see him in action.
sentences.cn: 看他打球是一种享受。

sentences.en: Martin was thinking of taking legal action against Zuckerman.
sentences.cn: 马丁在考虑对朱克曼提起诉讼。

sentences.en: More vigorous action is needed to force the federal army to disengage.
sentences.cn: 需要更强有力的行动来迫使联邦军队撤军。

sentences.en: Now there is a dawning realisation that drastic action is necessary.
sentences.cn: 现在人们开始意识到必须采取断然的行动。

sentences.en: Only with mass direct action will we obtain such change.
sentences.cn: 只有采取大规模直接行动，我们才会取得这样的改变。

sentences.en: She was looking forward to putting her ideas into action (=  doing the things she had planned  ) .
sentences.cn: 她盼望着将自己的想法付诸实施。

sentences.en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentences.cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentences.en: the action of the heart
sentences.cn: 心脏功能

sentences.en: The child could not be held responsible for his actions (= he was too young to be blamed for them ) .
sentences.cn: 不能要求这个小孩对自己的行为负责。

sentences.en: The drug blocks the action of the cancer gene.
sentences.cn: 这种药能遏制癌症基因的作用。

sentences.en: The General does not like non-combatant personnel near a scene of action.
sentences.cn: 将军不喜欢非战斗部队人员靠近战场。

sentences.en: The government must take action (=  do something  ) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.cn: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

sentences.en: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.cn: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

sentences.en: The lift started off, juddered, and went out of action.
sentences.cn: 电梯开动了，接着剧烈震颤起来，然后就毫无反应了。

sentences.en: The magistrates granted that the charity was justified in bringing the action.
sentences.cn: 地方法官承认该慈善机构有理由提起诉讼。

sentences.en: There have been reports of widespread enemy action in the area.
sentences.cn: 据报敌军在该地区开展大规模行动。

sentences.en: watching him in action, normal workers are left in awe.
sentences.cn: 看他工作，普通工人都肃然起敬。

sentences.en: What we need is not manifestos of pious intentions, but real action.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的不是善意但难以实现的宣言，而是实际行动。
